attributes.action: help the environment by discouraging ironing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ever though about how much power is used by people ironing clothes across the UK and the rest of the world?
OK we might have to go to work in a scrumpled shirt but by stopping ironing we would be reducing carbon emissions and saving a bit of time in the process.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
